entity

Class Assessment

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Assessment

  • public class Assessment
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores data about an assessment that a teacher would assign, for example:
    • Name: Unit 4 Math Test
    • Course: Math
    • Weight: 4
    • Categories: Knowledge, Thinking
    Author:
    Andi Gu

    • Constructor Detail

      • Assessment

        public Assessment(java.lang.String name,
          Course course,
          int weight)
        Constructs new Assessment object that starts out with no categories.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the assessment.
        course - Course that the assessment belongs to.
        weight - Weight of the assessment in the final average.
